decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed two storey side extension, by reason of its design, scale, bulk and massing, would appear unduly dominant and visually prominent from the Victoria Road and Heathfield Drive streetscenes, it would be viewed as an incongruous form of development to the dwellinghouse and surrounding area. The proposal is therefore contrary to Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policy CS 14 of the Merton LDF Core Planning Strategy (2011) and Policies DM D2 & DM D3 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan (2014).

Reason : 2 - The proposed two storey side extension, by reason of its design, scale, height, form and siting would appear overbearing toward neighbouring occupiers; resulting in an increased sense of enclosure and loss of sunlight and daylight toward 56 Victoria Road's garden and side facing windows, and an undue loss of privacy toward 3 Heathfield Drive. The proposal is therefore contrary to Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policy CS 14 of the Merton LDF Core Planning Strategy (2011) and Policies DM D2 & DM D3 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan (2014).

Reason : 3 - INFORMATIVE:
Note to Applicant
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton  (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:
"	Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
"	Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
"	As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:
"	The application was considered to be fundamentally contrary to the provisions of the Development Plan and the NPPF, and there were not considered to be any solutions to resolve this conflict. 
"	It is noted that the applicant/agent did not engage in any pre-application discussions.
"	The applicant is advised to seek pre-application advice on any resubmission.
description: ERECTION OF A TWO STOREY SIDE EXTENSION, ALTERATIONS TO THE FRONT PORCH AND ERECTION OF A BIN STORE.
